entities.name: hungarian horntail
entities.description: The Hungarian Horntail is mentioned as one of the dragons that will be participating in the first task. (Excerpt: 'the Three Broomsticks pub... the Hungarian Horntail')

entities.name: three broomsticks
entities.description: The Three Broomsticks is a pub where Harry and Hermione go to have a butterbeer. (Excerpt: 'Why don’t we go and have a butterbeer in the Three Broomsticks')

entities.name: honeydukes
entities.description: Honeydukes is a shop where Harry backs into to avoid Rita Skeeter. (Excerpt: 'Harry backed into the wall of Honeydukes')

entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is a journalist who is carrying a crocodile-skin handbag and is trying to hit Harry with it. (Excerpt: 'Harry backed into the wall of Honeydukes to stop Rita Skeeter from hitting him')

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who is talking to Harry and is trying to avoid thinking about the first task. (Excerpt: 'He didn’t mention this; he and Hermione hadn’t discussed what was coming in the first task')

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is talking to Hermione and is trying to avoid thinking about the first task. (Excerpt: 'He didn’t mention this; he and Hermione hadn’t discussed what was coming in the first task')

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student who is mentioned as someone Harry doesn’t have to talk to. (Excerpt: 'You don’t have to talk to Ron!')

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are talking to each other about the first task. (Excerpt: 'He didn’t mention this; he and Hermione hadn’t discussed what was coming in the first task')
Harry is trying to avoid Rita Skeeter who is trying to hit him with her crocodile-skin handbag. (Excerpt: 'Harry backed into the wall of Honeydukes to stop Rita Skeeter from hitting him')
Hermione is talking to Harry and trying to avoid thinking about the first task. (Excerpt: 'He didn’t mention this; he and Hermione hadn’t discussed what was coming in the first task')
Harry is going to the Three Broomsticks with Hermione. (Excerpt: 'Why don’t we go and have a butterbeer in the Three Broomsticks')
Hermione is going to the Three Broomsticks with Harry. (Excerpt: 'Why don’t we go and have a butterbeer in the Three Broomsticks')
